Interface Person

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Person extends Remote, Serializable
Represents the person.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

    • createAccount

      Account createAccount(String subId) throws RemoteException
      Creates an account. If the account with the specified id exists, returns it. Otherwise, creates a new account.
      Parameters:
      subId - account's id
      Returns:
      the created account
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if remote server error occurred
